info.task: navigate forwards to an image inside a banner landmark
info.title: Navigate forwards to an image inside a banner landmark

setupScript.name: setFocusBeforeBanner
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the banner landmark
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link before the banner landmark
testPageDocument.getElementById('beforelink').focus();

user: With focus on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'W3C Logo' image.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'W3C Logo' image.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.
